divs: Sighting DetailsIT was back in 1983 me and my brother in law were on a river at night catfishing we headed back to the boat ramp after fishing the lines, and the boat was loaded with cat fish, It was A dark night No moon no clowds we took our last sharp curve and headed down a stright away and to our left in the top of the pine trees we saw an orange lite, We slowed down or the motor shut off I can't remember but this lite came across the tops of the trees real slow.It seem to take forever to bust out of the trees It look just like a comet with a tail it was as big as a VW car, but it moved so slow and so stright across the river to the other side of the tree tops and not a sound, Nothing. It was 150 ft across that river and it took at least 8 sec' for it to cross.Big an long 50ft from front to the back of the tail, it was just the shape of a comet but right at tree top hight and was moving in a stright line, not at an angle. I looked back at my brother in law to ask what that was? all he said was I don't know. and he went to pulling the rope to get the motor started, we never said a word about it to each other and I still am not sure what this was. can anyone shed some lite on this for me. stacy p. brown
Summary: This took place in the winter time, not a lot of people on the river. So we had it to our selfs or so we thought!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Sopchoppy
This sighting has never been favorited.
